name: Adventure (itch) (Harsha-Games)
description:
Welcome to Adventure,a scrolling platformer.
You are in the wild on a epic adventure,but you are lost,can you find your way back?
controls:arrow keys,wasd,or mobile to move.
Collect all the orbs and get to the portal to win.
(the portal will lighten up if you collected all the orbs,if you have not it will be dark and going through it will not bring you to the next level)
